build.buildCommand: curl -fsSL https://bun.sh/install | bash && export BUN_INSTALL="$HOME/.bun" && export PATH="$BUN_INSTALL/bin:$PATH" && bun run build:packages && cd client/apps/realtime-server && bun run build

deploy.startCommand: export BUN_INSTALL="$HOME/.bun" && export PATH="$BUN_INSTALL/bin:$PATH" && cd client/apps/realtime-server && bun run start
